Welcome to Personal Assistant’s documentation!¶

Personal Assistant: manage¶

Django’s command-line utility for administrative tasks.

manage.main()¶

The main function is used to run administrative tasks.

Returns:

A value

Doc-author:

Trelent

Personal Assistant: Docs¶

Personal Assistant: News¶

news.views.fetch_news(lang='en')¶
The fetch_news function fetches the latest news from the NewsAPI.
Args:

lang (str): The language of the news to be fetched. Defaults to English (‘en’).

Returns:

list[dict]: A list of dictionaries containing information about each article, including title, description and url.

Parameters:

lang – Specify the language of news

Returns:

A list of dictionaries

Doc-author:

Trelent

news.views.get_news(category='general')¶

The get_news function takes in a category as an argument and returns the top headlines from that category. The default value for the category is &quot;general&quot;.

Parameters:

category – Specify the category of news you want to get

Returns:

A list of dictionaries

Doc-author:

Trelent

news.views.main(request)¶

The main function is the entry point for the news app. It renders a template called index.html, which displays all of the articles in our database.

Parameters:

request – Get the request object that is sent to the view

Returns:

The template index

Doc-author:

Trelent

news.views.news_list(request, category='general')¶

The news_list function is responsible for rendering the news_list.html template, which displays a list of news articles from the News API. The function takes in an optional category parameter which specifies what category of news to display (e.g., business, entertainment). If no category is specified, then it defaults to &quot;general&quot;.

Parameters:

  • request – Pass the request object to the view

  • category – Filter the news by category

Returns:

A rendered template

Doc-author:

Trelent

news.views.news_list_ua(request, topic='main')¶

The news_list_ua function is a view that displays the news in Ukrainian. It takes one argument, request, and returns an HttpResponseRedirect object if the language of the session is English. Otherwise it opens data.json file with UTF-8 encoding and loads its content into list_news variable as a dictionary object. Then it creates context dictionary with three keys: ‘news’, ‘categories’ and ‘topic’. The value of each key depends on its name: the value for key &quot;news&quot; is equal to list_news[topic], where topic = &quot;main&quot; by default; the value for

Parameters:

  • request – Get the request object

  • topic – Select news from a specific category

Returns:

The news_ua

Doc-author:

Trelent

news.views.parse_date(iso_date)¶

The parse_date function takes a string in ISO 8601 format and returns a datetime object.

Parameters:

iso_date – Pass the date string to the function

Returns:

A datetime object

Doc-author:

Trelent

Personal Assistant: News¶

news.scrap_news.articles_scraped()¶

The articles_scraped function scrapes the news from unian.ua and saves it to a json file

Returns:

A dictionary with the following structure:

Doc-author:

Trelent

news.scrap_news.parse_news_ua(url: str, attr: str, limit=5)¶

The parse_news_ua function takes in a url and an attribute, and returns a list of dictionaries. The function scrapes the news website for the top 5 articles on that page, and then uses another function to scrape each article’s content. It then creates a dictionary with all of this information, which is appended to the list.

Parameters:

  • url – str: Pass the url of the news site

  • attr – str: Specify the class of the news articles

  • limit – Limit the number of news articles that are scraped

Returns:

A list of dictionaries

Doc-author:

Trelent

news.scrap_news.scrap_article(url: str)¶
The scrap_article function takes a url as an argument and returns a dictionary with the following keys:

  • content: The text of the article.

  • date: The date on which the article was published.

Parameters:

url – str: Specify the type of data that will be passed to the function

Returns:

A dictionary with two keys:

Doc-author:

Trelent

Personal Assistant: News¶

news.context_processors.currency_data(request)¶

The currency_data function returns a dictionary of currency data. The keys are the currency codes, and the values are their exchange rates.

Parameters:

request – Pass the request object to the view

Returns:

A dictionary with two keys:

Doc-author:

Trelent

news.context_processors.news_widget(request)¶

The news_widget function is a view that returns the latest news items.

Parameters:

request – Get the language from the session

Returns:

A dictionary

Doc-author:

Trelent
